title: Former Assassin's Creed and Far Cry director says Ubisoft 'became very allergic' to new games, which contributed to a 'talent drain'
partialText: Alex Hutchinson diagnoses the downward trajectory of his former employer.

title: Arc Raiders' latest weapon changes are a well-aimed nerf at free loadouters, but I'm more amazed that the Il Toro escaped the chopping block
partialText: Embark is focusing on "the balance between our low-tier and high-tier weapons".

partialText: Will Nacon's hardware wing be the first to feel the brunt of debt restructuring efforts?

partialText: Meow meow meeeooww. Meow meow meeooww.

title: Resident Evil Requiem PC performance analysis: Great visuals and decent frame rates all round, though path tracing's an obvious frame rate killer

title: This creator extraordinaire has built a gaming PC attached to a Victorian cast-iron radiator that is fully integrated into the cooling system, and I am in complete awe

title: Best VPN for gaming in 2026
partialText: Prevent DDoS attacks, secure your devices, boost your speed, and get games for bargain prices – all with a gaming VPN. Here are my top picks.

title: Styx publisher Nacon files for insolvency just a week after we gave its latest game 82%, asks white-knuckling creditors to figure out what's next in 'a calm and constructive framework'
partialText: The studio says it's trying to "develop a credible and effective continuation plan."

title: HP warns that memory now makes up around 35% of the cost its PCs, double that of a year ago
partialText: Yet another entry for the annals of the memory crisis.

partialText: The boring old Water Pump has a newfound purpose.

title: 'I taught my dog to vibe code games': Yup, someone actually managed to get Claude AI to code a game based on the keyboard inputs of a pooch
partialText: If this is what a Cavapoo can do, goodness knows what a Border Collie would code.

title: Arc Raiders promises severe repercussions for cheating after Marathon twisted the knife on its recent woes: 'Serious infractions now carry stricter consequences'
partialText: What you gonna do when Arc comes for you?

partialText: What good raids and MSQ does to a WoL.

title: Valve owns up to inaccurate Steam hardware survey findings, saying 'VRAM on some graphics cards was not reported correctly'
partialText: Still, it's reassuring that not everyone but you is gaming on the shiniest hardware.

title: A plague of AI-generated Homer Simpson cover songs is reportedly swamping a popular music file sharing network with the big yellow fella's dulcet tones
partialText: "Kids, you tried your best and you failed miserably. The lesson is, never try."

partialText: Teamwork makes the dreamwork, as they say.

title: Resident Evil director Paul W.S. Anderson says the first movie doesn't adapt the games because it would ruin everything: 'Imagine watching Alien if, going into the cinema, someone told you they all die apart from Sigourney Weaver'
partialText: "What I loved about Resident Evil, apart from the fact it was a great game, was it was clearly patterned on a series of movies that I had loved growing up."

title: Marathon Server Slam start times and rewards
partialText: Your go-to guide to the Marathon open preview weekend.

title: When Capcom brought in a professional screenwriter for the original Resident Evil 2, it was his idea to fully embrace the series' goofy puzzles: 'We’ll just have to make the police chief a weirdo!'
partialText: In an alternate timeline, Resident Evil could've become a lot more serious.

title: Steam Next Fest is full of Balatro-likes: here's 7 demos I think you should try

title: This new clicker game dares ask: What if Bongo Cat picked up a sword and started killing everything he saw?

title: Path of Exile's next update might prevent your cursor from killing you, and it has a bunch of QoL changes that even PoE 2 doesn't have yet
partialText: While it may be old, PoE 1's oldest systems continue to be polished with every expansion.

title: Reddit fined nearly $20 million by UK online privacy regulator for 'using children’s data unlawfully, potentially exposing them to inappropriate and harmful content'

title: Games that use Vulkan can now use FSR 4 upscaling thanks to the latest OptiScaler
partialText: The third-party tool beats AMD to the punch once again.
